channel.title: Ryan's Blog
channel.description: Ryan Brewer's personal blog, covering ideas in programming languages, software, logic, abstract math, and analytic philosophy.

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: A test post for the blog. Read more here!

item.title: An Introduction to Proofs with Dependent Types
item.description: This post introduces the basic ideas behind dependent-type-based proof assistants, and expressing logic with types and values. Read more here!
